pli-tv-pvr2.12:1.1: When it comes to the offenses that are a result of consenting to physical contact, in how many of the seven classes of offenses are they found?
pli-tv-pvr2.12:1.3: they may be in the class of offenses entailing expulsion; they may be in the class of offenses entailing suspension; they may be in the class of serious offenses; they may be in the class of offenses entailing confession; they may be in the class of offenses of wrong conduct. …
pli-tv-pvr2.12:2.1: When it comes to the offenses that are a result of asking for curd and then eating it, in how many of the seven classes of offenses are they found?
pli-tv-pvr2.12:2.3: they may be in the class of offenses entailing acknowledgment; they may be in the class of offenses of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr2.12:3.1: The fourth section on “being found in” is finished.
